imdb.title: Dart Line World 1949
plot: In 1949, Mao Zedong led by the Chinese Communists and Chiang Kai-shek as the representative of the Kuomintang reactionary government decided the final victory of the decisive battle.::Youku.com

In 1949, Mao Zedong led by the Chinese Communists and Chiang Kai-shek as the representative of the Kuomintang reactionary government decided the final victory of the decisive battle, when the victory of the balance after the tilt Xibaipo, Mao Zedong moved to Peking, he is full of worry to the whole party China's history for thousands of years without a dynasty can escape its "Xing also bo Yan", "its death suddenly Yan" this "cycle of the cycle of death," the vicious circle, he boldly shouted two slogans: "We Inappropriate Li Zicheng! "" We can jump out of this cycle rate! " The play as the creative theme, around the Communists "political consultation, democratic nation-building" and "style of Qing Dynasty".::Youku.com
